io.konik.zugferd.datatype.qualified

Class DateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.konik.zugferd.datatype.qualified.DateTime

  • public class DateTime
extends Object
    The Class DateTime consist of the date represented as string and the format on how the date should be parsed.
    Example: <IssueDateTime format="102">20130605</IssueDateTime>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateTime()
      Instantiates a new date time with current date and format code 102.
      DateTime(Date date)
      Instantiates a new date time with the default date format code 102 (YYYYMMDD)
      Example: 20130305 (YYYYMMDD)
      DateTime(Date date, DateTimeFormat formatCode)
      Instantiates a new date time with the given format code.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFormat()
      Gets the date format code.
      Example: 102
      String getValue()
      Gets the date value.
      DateTime setFormat(DateTimeFormat formatCode)
      Sets the format code.
      DateTime setFormat(String formatCode)
      Sets the format code.
      DateTime setValue(String value)
      Sets the date value.
      Example: 20130305
